resources.string: Question 1: (25 marks)\n\nThe number 3, 4 and 6 denote the areas of their respective triangles. What is the area of the yellow region?
Question 2: (30 marks)\n\n10 exactly same coins are allocated to 4 people. How many different results are possible? (people can get 0 coin)
Question 4: (30 marks)\n\nIn following column addition operation, each letter represents a different digit. What is the value of S + E + N + D + M + O + R + Y?
